* [`ccs_daq`](#ccs_daq): Configure LSST CCS DAQ related services by creating /etc/ccs config files.

## Classes

### <a name="ccs_daq"></a>`ccs_daq`

Configure LSST CCS DAQ related services by creating /etc/ccs config files.
Note that this mod is tightly coupled to the lsst/daq mod.

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `ccs_daq` class:

* [`owner`](#-ccs_daq--owner)
* [`group`](#-ccs_daq--group)
* [`config_dir`](#-ccs_daq--config_dir)
* [`instrument`](#-ccs_daq--instrument)
* [`apps_noinstrument`](#-ccs_daq--apps_noinstrument)

##### <a name="-ccs_daq--owner"></a>`owner`

Data type: `String`

CCS user

Default value: `'ccsadm'`

##### <a name="-ccs_daq--group"></a>`group`

Data type: `String`

CCS group

Default value: `'ccsadm'`

##### <a name="-ccs_daq--config_dir"></a>`config_dir`

Data type: `String`

CCS configuration directory

Default value: `'/etc/ccs'`

##### <a name="-ccs_daq--instrument"></a>`instrument`

Data type: `String`

Name of the camera

Default value: `'comcam'`

##### <a name="-ccs_daq--apps_noinstrument"></a>`apps_noinstrument`

Data type: `Boolean`

If true, do not include "instrument-" in the /etc/ccs/*.app names.

Default value: `false`
